titles.title: HP508 Praise the Lord with joyful cry

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord with joyful cry;
Let the mood of praise run high.
Praise him who with mighty deeds
Human greatness far exceeds.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise him with the sound that swings
With percussion, brass and strings.
Let the world at every chance
Praise him with a song and dance

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise with life and voice the Lord,
Him who speaks in deed and word,
Who to life the world ordained:
Let our praise be unrestrained.
